text: Verkhnekirovsky () is a rural locality (a village) in Pavlovsky Selsoviet, Nurimanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 32 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 40 km from Krasnaya Gorka, 1 km from Pavlovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Nurimanovsky District
title: Verkhnekirovsky
